data-sync-interval.help: Time interval between collection of switch data (30 - 1800 sec, default = 60, 0 = disable).
data-sync-interval.name: data-sync-interval

dynamic-periodic-interval.help: Periodic time interval to run Dynamic port policy engine (5 - 60 sec, default = 15).
dynamic-periodic-interval.name: dynamic-periodic-interval

iot-holdoff.help: MAC entry's creation time. Time must be greater than this value for an entry to be created (0 - 10080 mins, default = 5 mins).
iot-holdoff.name: iot-holdoff

iot-mac-idle.help: MAC entry's idle time. MAC entry is removed after this value (0 - 10080 mins, default = 1440 mins).
iot-mac-idle.name: iot-mac-idle

iot-scan-interval.help: IoT scan interval (2 - 10080 mins, default = 60 mins, 0 = disable).
iot-scan-interval.name: iot-scan-interval

iot-weight-threshold.help: MAC entry's confidence value. Value is re-queried when below this value (default = 1, 0 = disable).
iot-weight-threshold.name: iot-weight-threshold

nac-periodic-interval.help: Periodic time interval to run NAC engine (5 - 60 sec, default = 15).
nac-periodic-interval.name: nac-periodic-interval

options.help: Least restrictive. Supports the widest variety of hardware and software versions.
options.name: compatible

options.help: Moderate level of security. Supports recent generations of hardware and latest software versions.
options.name: moderate

options.help: Highest level of security. Supports only the latest generation of hardware and latest software version.
options.name: strict
